properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 4 at 3:51AM CST until February 6 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Springfield MO
properties.description:
...Light Wintry Precipitation Followed By Accumulating Snow...

.A light wintry mix of precipitation will spread from northwest to
southeast across the region this afternoon and tonight as a low
pressure system approaches from the southwest. Snow will then
develop from southwest to northeast across the area on Wednesday
and may be heavy at times along and north of the Interstate 44
corridor. A wintry mix will remain possible Wednesday across
south-central Missouri.

* WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations
of 2 to 4 inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth of
an inch.

* WHERE...Bourbon County.

* WHEN...From noon today to 6 AM CST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the evening and morning commutes.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

Road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 6 AM CST THURSDAY
